settings.title: What are compression socks?
settings.content: Compression socks are specialized hosiery designed to improve blood circulation, reduce swelling, and alleviate pain in the legs and feet. They apply gentle pressure to your legs and ankles, promoting blood flow from your legs back to your heart.

settings.title: How do compression socks work?
settings.content: They work by applying graduated compression, meaning the pressure is highest at the ankles and gradually decreases towards the knees. This helps to move blood up the leg against the pull of gravity, reducing swelling, fatigue, and the risk of blood clots.

settings.title: What sizes do your compression socks come in?
settings.content: Our compression socks are available in various sizes ranging from XS to LG/XL in both standard and wide leg. Please refer to our sizing chart on the product page to find your perfect fit or click HERE.

settings.title: What level of compression do your socks offer?
settings.content: We offer a range of compression levels, from mild (8-15 mmHg) to a everyday firm fit (15-20 mmHg), to cater to different needs and preferences. Each product description includes the compression level

settings.title: Who should wear compression socks?
settings.content: Compression socks are beneficial for people who stand or sit for long periods, athletes, pregnant women, and individuals with certain medical conditions. However, it's always best to consult with a healthcare professional before starting to wear compression socks.

settings.title: Can I wear compression socks all day?
settings.content: Yes, our compression socks are designed for all-day comfort. However, we recommend removing them before bed unless your healthcare provider advises otherwise.

settings.title: How do I put on compression socks correctly?
settings.content: Start by turning the sock inside out, except for the foot part. Slip your foot in and gradually unroll the sock up your leg. Make sure the sock is smooth and without wrinkles.

settings.title: How should I wash my compression socks?
settings.content: For best results, hand wash your socks in warm water with mild soap and air dry. If you use a machine, place them in a mesh laundry bag, use a gentle cycle, and air dry.

settings.title: How often should I replace my compression socks?
settings.content: For optimal benefits, we recommend replacing your compression socks every 3-6 months, depending on how often you wear them and how well you care for them.

settings.title: Where are Crazy Compression socks made?
settings.content: Our socks are proudly made in our families 3rd generation factory located in Hickory, NC.

settings.title: What are Crazy Compression socks made of?
settings.content: 97% Stay Cool Nylon, 3% Spandex

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.content: Within 3-5 business days, anticipate an additional 3-5 day delivery to your residence.

settings.title: Can I change or cancel my order after it's been placed?
settings.content: We strive to process orders quickly, but if you need to change or cancel your order, please contact our customer service team support@crazycompression.com as soon as possible. We can only make changes or cancellations if your order has not yet been processed for shipping.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my orders?
settings.content: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: How do I return or exchange an item?
settings.content: You can access our exchange & return portal HERE.

settings.title: How long does it take to receive a refund?
settings.content: Once we receive and inspect your returned item(s), we will process your refund. Please allow up to 10 business days for the refund to be credited back to your original form of payment. We will notify you via email once your refund has been processed.

settings.title: Return and Exchange Policy
settings.content:
We want you to love your Crazy Compression gear as much as we do. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, here‚Äôs how you can return or exchange it:

Time Frame:

  • You have 30 days from the date of purchase to return your items.

Condition:

  • Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in their original condition with tags attached.

Process:

  1. Initiate a Return: Contact our support team at [support@crazycompression.com] to initiate your return or use our customer return portal HERE Please include your order number and the reason for the return.
  2. Return Approval: Wait for our team to respond with return approval and instructions on where to send your items.
  3. Shipping: You are responsible for return shipping costs unless the item is defective or there was a mistake on our part. We recommend using a trackable shipping service, as we can‚Äôt be responsible for items lost in transit.
  4. Inspection: Once we receive your returned items, we will inspect them and process your refund or exchange within 5-7 business days. We‚Äôll send you an email confirmation once your return is processed.

Exchanges:

  • For exchanges, please follow the return process for the item you wish to return and place a new order for the item you would like instead.

Defective or Incorrect Items:

  • If you received a defective or incorrect item, please contact us immediately so we can make things right.

Final Sale Items:

  • Please note that items marked as final sale cannot be returned or exchanged.

Refunds:

  • Refunds will be processed to the original method of payment. Shipping fees are non-refundable.

Your satisfaction is our top priority. If you have any questions or need assistance with your return, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.

settings.title: Where is my link/code?
settings.content: Your affiliate link has been emailed to you. If you haven‚Äôt received it yet please check your junk or spam folder. If it‚Äôs not there click here to get in contact with our Customer Experience team.

settings.title: How are sales tracked?
settings.content: All commissions and payouts are tracked through the Social Snowball dashboard. You can complete your registration or login in here. If you are registering your account, please ensure you use the same email you place your Crazy Compression orders with, or the email you used to sign up for the affiliate program.

settings.title: How much will I get paid?
settings.content: All affiliates are awarded "Store Credit" until their sales exceed over $1,000. Then they'll have the ability to earn up to 20% in commissions of gross sales they generate.

settings.title: How it works

• Complete the form above and receive your custom link.¬†

settings.title: Term & Conditions
settings.content:
• Any commissions produced or referred by discount aggregators such as Honey Browser Extension will not be paid out to affiliate members. If your affiliate code has been detected by our fraud center you may be banned from the affiliate program at our discretion. We recognize that affiliate codes being picked up by discount aggregators may be caused by external factors. If you have been banned and would like us to review your account, please reach out to hello@shopforefathers.com to further investigate the matter.
  • Your discount link will remain the same for the lifetime of the program. If Fore Fathers makes any changes to the affiliate program you will be notified via email with further instructions. Please ensure to check your spam folder if you can not locate the email.
  • You may distribute your referral link to as many people as you would like, but commissions will only be paid out one time per customer using your referral link.
  • All commissions are produced in USD currency value of % of sales. If you qualify for a payment you will be sent a digital prepaid visa to your email via Tremendous. All payments are sent out on a monthly basis within 5 working days of the following month.
  • When you make a purchase with Fore Fathers you will be automatically placed into our affiliate program and given a unique link to refer friends. You are not obligated to take any action with your unique referral link. Any individual that wishes to be removed from this program, please reach out to hello@shopforefathers.com
